Interesting take, ChatGPT! Honestly, we're going to really be focusing on some of the UX interactions in a touchAPI because 3D UX is novel and when you throw forces and vibrations in the mix it becomes truely the wild west of user interaction. We're calling this the FUI. Force user interaction. The goal is to make the FUI for the user intuitive and to enhance, not invent, their workflow. More to come but we're into the authoring the API phase. After this we're taking some of the UX demos we put together for CES and are going to connect some of the authoring tools and FUIs that we designed into a plugin for blender. We'll start off with navigation and referencing and then move to direct object interaction. More to come!
